title: Unknown
description:
It happens every year. A select few disappear, never to return.From The Falkland Islands to the Himalayas, Puerto Rico to England – people are vanishing without trace or explanation. A young man who’s lost everything stumbles across an ancient secret.Can he unlock the mystery? Will he find those who need him?...can he escape the Unknown?Praise from ★★★★★"Phenomenal." - Rachel Granoff, Amazon review
★★★★★"Excellent storytelling."
 - Anne-Marie Chamberlain, Amazon review
author: Phil Price
